title: Nobunaga no Shinobi (Ninja Girl & Samurai Master)
synopsis: Rescued from nearly drowning in a river, a young Chidori yearns to pay back her savior's kindness. Though her cute and innocent appearance might not show it, she is actually a highly skilled ninja, so years later, Chidori and her friend Sukezou come to serve under the man who saved herâ€”the ambitious warlord, Nobunaga Oda.
